About Me

Hi. I'm Matt Creenan, a 40-ish year-old software engineer based in Buffalo, NY.

I'm married with two kids, a dog scared of his own shadow, and a cat that wants to be a dog.

When I'm not working, I may be watching football (Go Bills) with my wife and son, or suffering watching the Buffalo Sabres alone.

This website's aesthetic was an experiment in trying to get an AI tool to generate a design based on an aesthetic I love. I kept asking it for changes until it got something in the realm of what I was looking for.
